Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Draw two students holding cups connected by a string.
Depict the basic outline of a string telephone setup, including two cups and a string.
Partially show that the string needs to be taut for the string telephone to work (e.g., the string might be mostly straight but with a bit of slack).
CANNOT: Clearly illustrate how the string telephone helps the students communicate over a distance (e.g., might not indicate how sound travels through the string).
Include light or sound waves as a method of communication (e.g., may not draw sound waves or any indication of how sound travels).
Accurately show that the string needs to be fully taut and the cups need to be properly used (e.g., string depicted as extremely slack or cups not correctly positioned by the students).
